title: Tuition Payment Due
description: The due date for the tuition payment for the upcoming school term.

title: Social Work Day
description: Our mandatory social work event for adult family members. As a cooperative school, many hands make light work and that includes getting the school in tip top shape for the year. Please send an adult to help get the school ready (infants in carriers or strollers welcome!). We will have a variety of cleaning and maintenance tasks to take care of.

description: Orientation session for children enrolled in the 3 and 5-day programs at Big Nursery.

title: Big Nursery: 2 Day Orientation
description: Orientation session for children enrolled in the 2-day program at Big Nursery.

title: Officer's Meeting
description: Meeting for the school's officers to discuss organizational matters.

description: School closed in observance of Indigenous People's Day.

title: Picture Day
description: Don't forget to dress your best for picture day! Photos will be taken throughout the school day.

title: Picture Day - Makeup Date
description: If a student missed picture day, the makeup session will be held during the school day.

description: The due date for the next tuition payment.

description: A work day for teachers; no classes will be held for students.

description: Meeting for the school's officers; all are welcome to attend.

description: School closed for the winter holiday break.

description: A meeting of the full board; all members of the school community are welcome to attend.
